text: Wies van Dongen (30 July 1931 â€“ 25 May 2022) was a Dutch professional racing cyclist. He rode in two tournaments of the Tour de France. Dongen was born in Breda, Netherlands. Dongen died on 25 May 2022, aged 90. Wies van Dongen overleden, was de oudste nog levende Nederlandse Tourrenner ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch cyclists
title: Wies van Dongen
